author: dildick
body:
Previously I only added .txt files for the emulator. I translated them into hex for the firmware.

GEMCSC is organized into subdirs:
   * CoordinateConversion (already filled)
   * SlopeCorrection (coming in next PR)
   * BendingAngle (coming in next PR)
title: Mem files for verilog implementation. Organize GEMCSC in subdirs
